meanings.sent1: The little girl had redlegs from playing in the sun all day.
meanings.sent2: I saw a man with redlegs walking on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The redlegs on the hiker made him look like a flamingo.
meanings.sent4: Her redlegs stood out in the crowd like beacons.
meanings.sent5: The redlegs of the runner were a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: The robin had vibrant redlegs that caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a crane with redlegs by the pond.
meanings.sent3: The redlegs of the flamingo made it easy to spot in the water.
meanings.sent4: The redlegs of the cardinal added a pop of color to the tree.
meanings.sent5: The heron's redlegs contrasted beautifully with its feathers.

meanings.definition: A type of plant with red legs.
meanings.sent1: The flower bed was filled with redlegs swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I planted some redlegs in my garden for a splash of color.
meanings.sent3: The redlegs in the garden seemed to dance in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The redlegs of the plant reached towards the sunlight like flames.
meanings.sent5: The redlegs of the shrub added a unique touch to the landscape.
